Package bio.singa.structure.algorithms.superimposition.fit3d

Interface Fit3D

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Fit3DAlignment, Fit3DAlignmentBatch, Fit3DSiteAlignment
    public interface Fit3D
    Represents an instance of the Fit3D algorithm. This can either be a one target one alignment (Fit3DAlignment) or an alignment batch (Fit3DAlignmentBatch).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static org.slf4j.Logger logger  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default java.lang.String getAlignmentString()
      Returns a string that represents the alignment.
      default double getFraction()
      Returns the fraction of residues that were aligned.
      java.util.List<Fit3DMatch> getMatches()
      Returns the matches that were found by this Fit3D search.
      default PsScore getPsScore()
      Returns the PsScore of aligned residues (only available for Fit3DSiteAlignment.
      default XieScore getXieScore()
      Returns the XieScore of aligned residues (only available for Fit3DSiteAlignment.
      default void writeMatches​(java.nio.file.Path outputDirectory)
      Writes the matches that were found by this Fit3D search to the specified directory.
      default void writeMatches​(java.nio.file.Path outputDirectory, double rmsdCutoff)
      Writes the matches that were found by this Fit3D search to the specified directory.
      default void writeSummaryFile​(java.nio.file.Path summaryFilePath)
      Writes a CSV summary file of the matches obtained by Fit3Di.

    • Field Detail

      • logger

        static final org.slf4j.Logger logger

    • Method Detail

      • getMatches

        java.util.List<Fit3DMatch> getMatches()
        Returns the matches that were found by this Fit3D search.
        Returns:
        The matches found in the target structure(s).

      • getFraction

        default double getFraction()
        Returns the fraction of residues that were aligned.
        Returns:
        The fractions of matches that were aligned.

      • getXieScore

        default XieScore getXieScore()
        Returns the XieScore of aligned residues (only available for Fit3DSiteAlignment.
        Returns:
        The XieScore of residues that were aligned.

      • getPsScore

        default PsScore getPsScore()
        Returns the PsScore of aligned residues (only available for Fit3DSiteAlignment.
        Returns:
        The PsScore of residues that were aligned.

      • writeMatches

        default void writeMatches​(java.nio.file.Path outputDirectory,
                          double rmsdCutoff)
        Writes the matches that were found by this Fit3D search to the specified directory. All matches are aligned to the query motif. Only matches up to the specified RMSD cutoff are reported.
        Parameters:
        outputDirectory - The directory where the matches should be written.
        rmsdCutoff - The cutoff up to which matches should be written.

      • writeMatches

        default void writeMatches​(java.nio.file.Path outputDirectory)
        Writes the matches that were found by this Fit3D search to the specified directory. All matches are aligned to the query motif.
        Parameters:
        outputDirectory - The directory where the matches should be written.

      • writeSummaryFile

        default void writeSummaryFile​(java.nio.file.Path summaryFilePath)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a CSV summary file of the matches obtained by Fit3Di.
        Parameters:
        summaryFilePath - The Path to which the file should be written.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If writing of the summary file fails.

      • getAlignmentString

        default java.lang.String getAlignmentString()
        Returns a string that represents the alignment. This is only available for the Fit3DSiteAlignment.
        Returns:
        The alignment in string representation.
